info.title: Nic Cage Eats Stuff
info.author: Cart1416
info.description: Collect the chicken and dodge celery!
info.details: A port of my Nic Cage Eats Stuff game to the Wii U. The game is simple, collect chicken and dodge the celery, try to get the highest score. Tip: hold a for invincibility\n\nOriginal games are available on ahf2139.pythonanywhere.com.

changelog:
v3.0
Added multiplayer support (up to 4)
Added Nic Cage Eats Stuff 2
Added Nic Crash
Added Joystick support

v2.0
Release 2.0
 - Added a menu
 - Added 2 new game modes
        - Impossible Nic Cage Eats Stuff
        - Easy Nic Cage Eats Stuff
 - Press - to access menu

1.0
I managed to make this game in 2 days as my first C++ game. This is just the base game but I might add some more games like all the mods I made in JavaScript.
